body_text:
This file is real weird. Why not import {router} from '...'; export default router;?
I also understand this exists to keep in line with the new file tree organization, but it seems strange to add this extra layer between state/index and routes.
body:
This file is real weird. Why not `import {router} from '...'; export default router;`?

I also understand this exists to keep in line with the new file tree organization, but it seems strange to add this extra layer between `state/index` and `routes`.
body_html:
This file is real weird. Why not import {router} from '...'; export default router;?

I also understand this exists to keep in line with the new file tree organization, but it seems strange to add this extra layer between state/index and routes.
